page.title: 01The Waltham St Lawrence Area
page.content:
The area includes parts of the parishes of{Waltham St. Lawrence}and{ {Hurst}. The parishes are situated in the{Thames Valley}about 5 miles {Reading}and about the same distance from{Maidenhead}and{Wokingham}.
The whole area is very flat and low lying and it gets very damp in the winter. The area is very rural with different types of farming providing the major land cover.
The population is concentrated almost entirely in the villages of Waltham{St. Lawrence}and{Shurlock Row and in the hamlet of{West End}.
